package.name: Vista Halloween Affiliations
package.description: A pack of Halloween-themed affiliation icons.
package.long:
Affiliation icons help distinguish rights and affiliations of multiuser chat participants. There are five possible affiliations: owner, admin, member, no affiliation and outcast (which is banned from the conference).

This pack contains affiliation icons borrowed from the Psi+ vista-halloween-affiliations iconset. The iconset is based on Vista halloween Icons by Icons Land.
